nodes.text: Star Wars: The Jedi and the Force

Star Wars: The Jedi and the Force is a hardcover reference book compiling three young-reader titles previously written by Catherine Saunders: Star Wars: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Jedi Knight, Star Wars: The Story of Darth Vader, and Star Wars: The Legendary Yoda. It was first published by Dorling Kindersley on May 5, 2014 and re-released under the Disney brand in 2016.
